entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 8:13 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:13 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 8:13 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
